name: Lasers and Nodes (NET)
description:
Lasers and Nodes (or NET, actually the title has never been defined...) is a turn based strategy game for 2 to 10 local players.

During each player's first turn, a Node can be placed on one of the available grid cells, choosing one of two types of Laser orientation: Perpendicular or Diagonal.

Nodes cannot be placed on other players Lasers, and for the rest of the turns, placement will only be available on player's Lasers (it can sound kind of difficult, but it's easier played than explained).

Game Objective

Fill as many cells as possible with your Lasers from each direction (with or without a Node of yours in it).

Controls Desktop

LEFT MOUSE - place a node or change its orientation

RIGHT MOUSE - remove a node

ENTER or SPACE - confirm node placement

F11 or F - toggle fullscreen

Mobile

Tap on a cell to place a node or change its orientation

Tap and hold to confirm node placement

Notes

The minimum grid size is the number of players + 1, while the maximum is 20.
